Mr Moon hosts seminars, at which, you may see him do public demonstrations.=
=C2=A0 But if you want a private reading.... $$$ (I've heard several hundre=
d dollars an hour, with discounts to conference atendees).

So one suspects=
 the public demonstrations probably help to acquire private clientele.



-=
-- On Thu, 6/17/10, Fiona Broome <email@...> wrote:

From: Fion=
a Broome <email@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Tesing-testing
To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Thursday, June 17, 2010, 8:25 AM







=C2=
=A0



  


    
      
      
      Hi,



Thank you, Frank!  



And, to =
answer a reference to money: My experience with Chris Moon didn't cost a ce=
nt.  In fact, the box spoke to me from across a large room -- I'd guess abo=
ut 20 or 30 feet away and from a platform about 10 feet above me -- in a di=
stinctive voice and speech pattern that I recognized immediately.  



I'd =
asked a rhetorical question. The box answered. That rattled me, big time.  =
After that, I stuck close to the box.  I wanted to hear more.



However, a=
t no time did this involve payment of any kind.  In fact, innate skeptic th=
at I am (having been badly burned by one regrettable association), I watche=
d Chris and Dina closely during the weekend.  I saw zero hustling or salesm=
anship. They never asked me for money, and have never asked me to talk abou=
t my experiences with the box.



My interest in the boxes and this list ar=
e unabashedly self-serving:  I want to understand why some devices work bet=
ter than others, why some of us hear them more clearly than others, who the=
 voices really are (if they're not who they seem to be), and the significan=
ce of what they're saying.  I want to hear more.



I don't have the expert=
ise to build a box, and I can't afford to hire someone to build one for me,=
 right now.  So, I'm on this list, listening vicariously to others' experie=
nces and recordings.



I'm grateful for those who share their insights, ex=
periences, thoughts on how we can understand this stuff better, and the rec=
ordings of voices that keep talking & talking.



Thanks again, Frank!



R=
elieved,

Fiona

      <p>Hi,<br>
<br>
Thank you, Frank!  <br>
<br>
And, to answer a re=
ference to money: My experience with Chris Moon didn't cost a cent.  In fac=
t, the box spoke to me from across a large room -- I'd guess about 20 or 30=
 feet away and from a platform about 10 feet above me -- in a distinctive v=
oice and speech pattern that I recognized immediately.  <br>
<br>
I'd asked=
 a rhetorical question. The box answered. That rattled me, big time.  After=
 that, I stuck close to the box.  I wanted to hear more.<br>
<br>
However, =
at no time did this involve payment of any kind.  In fact, innate skeptic t=
hat I am (having been badly burned by one regrettable association), I watch=
ed Chris and Dina closely during the weekend.  I saw zero hustling or sales=
manship. They never asked me for money, and have never asked me to talk abo=
ut my experiences with the box.<br>
<br>
My interest in the boxes and this =
list are unabashedly self-serving:  I want to understand why some devices w=
ork better than others, why some of us hear them more clearly than others, =
who the voices really are (if they're not who they seem to be), and the sig=
nificance of what they're saying.  I want to hear more.<br>
<br>
I don't ha=
ve the expertise to build a box, and I can't afford to hire someone to buil=
d one for me, right now.  So, I'm on this list, listening vicariously to ot=
hers' experiences and recordings.<br>
<br>
I'm grateful for those who share=
 their insights, experiences, thoughts on how we can understand this stuff =
better, and the recordings of voices that keep talking & talking.<br>
<=
br>
Thanks again, Frank!<br>
<br>
Relieved,<br>
Fiona<br>
